<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>sn_ex_sp.QuickLinkUtil</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Utility script to fetch and populate quick links</description> <name>QuickLinkUtil</name> <script><![CDATA[var QuickLinkUtil = Class.create(); QuickLinkUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(QuickLinkUtilSNC, { initialize: function() { QuickLinkUtilSNC.prototype.initialize.apply(this, arguments); },
